subject: Sales
title: Customer Success Stories That Convert
description: A short lesson to help you apply Customer Success Stories That Convert.

hook.text: A prospect hears about a company like theirs that solved the exact same problem. Suddenly they lean in.

buildup.text: Case studies work because they let prospects see themselves reflected in someone else's success.

discovery.text: The best stories follow a clear arc: problem, struggle, solution, and a measurable result.

twist.text: Generic stories fall flat. The more the success story matches the prospect's world, the harder it lands.

climax.text: Build a story library by industry and problem. The right case study at the right moment seals deals.

punchline.text: The right success story is worth a thousand slides.

quiz.question: What makes a customer success story most effective?
options: Closely matching the prospect's specific situation
